events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn’t fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the size was not as expected.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s message about returning the jacket and getting their money back.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Maria who specializes in returns and refund processes.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket that didn’t fit. I’m here to help!
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Thank you for your quick reply. My order number is 987654321. The jacket is completely unused and still in its original packaging as I received it.
Thanks for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process. You will receive an email with return instructions shortly. Once we get the jacket back, your payment will be fully refunded.
Great, thank you! I appreciate the fast response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as your refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for shopping with us and let us know if you need any help in the future.
